name: Web Undrtone
description: Undrtone is a socialized online music APP. You can directly click to play or search, add your favorite music. And it has functions such as thumb up and sharing.

en_US.description: Undrtone is a socialized online music APP. You can directly click to play or search, add your favorite music. And it has functions such as thumb up and sharing.
en_US.name: Web Undrtone

zh_CN.description: Undrtone是一个社交化的在线音乐应用，您可以直接点击播放歌曲或搜索、添加自己喜欢的音乐。同时Undrtone还具有点赞、分享功能。
zh_CN.name: Undrtone网页版
